description: This table contains Third Party Payer information about the coverage.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The ID of the third party payer that is sponsoring the coverage

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: The name of the third party payer that is sponsoring the coverage

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: The date the third party payer is effective for the coverage

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.description: The date the third party payer is terminated for the coverage
